channel.title: Puk on Forged Defiance
channel.description: Recent content in Puk on Forged Defiance

item.title: Unlock Android Device Using PUK Code
item.description: If you’ve ever got your PIN code wrong too many times and got your SIM locked, you were probably as surprised as I was when Android gives you no option to unlock the phone! Fortunately there’s an answer. To unlock your Android-based device go to the Emergency Call screen and enter in the following (replace the angled brackets with the appropriate info): **05*«PUK Code»*«Your new pin»*«Confirm your new pin»# So for example:
